Name: hhGrid
Summary: An excellent button grid control with plenty of options, thanks to Hermann Hoch

Name: hhSVGT
Summary: Uses SVG 'fonts' (included) to allow for scalable rotated, stylized text. Great for header titles or rotating text animations
Author: Hermann Hoch

Summary: Widget that uses native Apple PDF Kit view

Name: CoreMIDI Library
Summary: xTalk scripting for Apple's MIDI API

Summary: A modified version of the IDE's Tile widget

Name: Openxtalk.org macOS Native Tools
Summary: Included with OXT DPE, allows for addtional macOS native behaviors from your stacks, including native darkMode support

Name: FiveStar
